item.title: Provisioning New Lab VM
item.description: Get started There are two main ways to provision a new server: Net Boot from PXE ðŸ‘‰ This is the recommended method. It will install Ubuntu 21.10 Impish Indri. This will guide you step-by-step through Net Booting. â†’ Boot from ISO file ðŸ‘‰ This method will NOT configure your server with LDAP/AD authentication. This will guide you through provisioning via File ISO. â†’

item.title: Net Booting from PXE
item.description: Setup First, ensure you have a VPN connection to the O’Fallon Lab, have valid Innovations Lab credentials, and can log into Innovations Lab vSphere Provision Right click on DellCluster and select New Virtual Machine. Select Create a new virtual machine if it isn’t selected already and click Next. Give your VM a name, then click Next. NOTE: The name given will end up being the hostname of the vm, as well as the DNS routing name.
